dependencies.description:
The azureml-core contains functionality for creating and managing: *
Azure Machine Learning workspaces, experiments and runs; * Machine
learning compute respources; * Models, images and web services.
dependencies.name: py-azureml-core

dependencies.description:
Machine learning (ML) telemetry package is used to collect telemetry
data.
dependencies.name: py-azureml-telemetry

dependencies.description:
The azureml-train-restclients-hyperdrive contains functionality for
azureml-train metapackage.
dependencies.name: py-azureml-train-restclients-hyperdrive

dependencies.description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.
dependencies.name: py-flake8

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Represents a unit of computation in azureml-pipeline.
dependent_to.name: py-azureml-pipeline-steps

dependent_to.description:
The azureml-train package provides estimators for training models using
different deep learning frameworks and functionality for hyperparameter
tuning using Azure cloud.
dependent_to.name: py-azureml-train

description:
The azureml-train-core contains functionality used by azureml-train
metapackage.
name: py-azureml-train-core

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
